body_html: @teng-li -Werror should never be enabled for user builds. We can enable it in CI so that we can catch warnings for ourselves, but we never know what kind of compiler someone is going to use (and what errors they toggle by default), and setting -Werror in this case is just asking for people to be broken for no good reason.
body_text: @teng-li -Werror should never be enabled for user builds. body: @teng-li -Werror should never be enabled for user builds. We can enable it in CI so that we can catch warnings for ourselves, but we never know what kind of compiler someone is going to use (and what errors they toggle by default), and setting -Werror in this case is just asking for people to be broken for no good reason.
